metadata.title: CVE-2016-2779 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: runuser in util-linux allows local users to escape to the parent session via a crafted TIOCSTI ioctl call, which pushes characters to the terminal's input buffer.

notes.note: mdeslaur> 2.31 introduced a --pty option that can be used

criterions.comment: util-linux package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.33.1-0.1ubuntu2').
